text: Aaron Ciechanover ( ; ; born October 1, 1947) is an Israeli biologist. He won the Nobel prize in Chemistry for characterizing the method that cells use to degrade and recycle proteins using ubiquitin.Aaron Ciechanover and Avram Hershko 2004 Nobel in Chemistry â€“ A web article He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2009. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli biologists Category:Members of Academia Europaea
